bill.title: Bonds; require transparency before Mississippi Development Bank may issue on behalf of local governmental unit.
bill.description: An Act To Create A New Section 31-25-6, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide For Full Disclosure And Transparency In The Issuance Of Bonds On Behalf Of A Local Governmental Unit, By The Mississippi Development Bank; To Require The Governing Authority Of A Local Governmental Entity To File A Bond Financing Review Form With The State Auditor's Office Before Bonds May Be Issued By The Mississippi Development Bank On Behalf Of The Local Governmental Unit; To Set Forth The Information That Must Be Contained In Such A Bond Financing Review Form; To Require The Local Governmental Unit To Obtain Professional Advice In Preparing The Bond Financing Review Form; To Require Such Local Governmental Units To File With The State Auditor Certain Reports Pertaining To All Bond Issues That The Mississippi Development Bank Has Issued On Its Behalf; To Require The State Auditor To Maintain Such Reports; To Impose A Penalty For The Failure To Make Such Reports; To Amend Sections 31-25-5, 31-25-20, 31-25-21, 31-25-23, 31-25-27, 31-25-28 And 31-25-35, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity To The Provisions Of This Act; To Bring Forward Sections 31-25-31, 31-25-33 And 31-25-37, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Relate To The Issuance Of Bonds By The Mississippi Development Bank, For Purposes Of Amendment; And For Related Purposes.
